captions.text:
When India is progressing so fast,
why to go to America now, buddy?
Five reasons.

GirIs...money...fame...freedom...
and poIIution free air.

If we stay back here,
no outings with girIs,

you don't get Rs. 20000
even if we sIog entire month.

And you must compete with
a biIIion peopIe for everything.

We must be accountabIe to
our parents for breath we take.

My Iungs have got charred with
the poIIution of this city's air.
How Iong wiII you drink?

Why are you putting cigarette
ash into my drink?
Hey! That's my interview dress man!

BiII had come Iong time ago,
why are you stiII pondering about it?
Pay man.

My fate! Whether it is Rs. 50 or 50000,
I've to sheII out money.

If it's 50, you'II say
it's peanuts for me,

if it's 50000, you'II say
you can't afford.
What a nasty Iife!

Your father is a Minister who's
amassing weaIth Iooting pubIic,
you pay for his sins.

Let's meet in the restaurant

I'II not go...
pIease Iisten to me.
WiII you stay here to beg?

If you refuse to go again,
I'II rip out your skin.

I paid those cinema guys
Rs. 10 Iakhs,

and got you into this Iine, and

I can Iive Iike a prince here

You need to know EngIish

Beg or wash dishes,

I'II take Rs 2 crores as dowry

To heII with your avarice.

Nothing doing,
If you come out without a visa,

- Okay.
If you faiI inside I'II kiII you...

Rs 13 Iakhs.

I'm showing Rs 30 Iakhs,

Which coIIege?
Osmania.

IIT-Bombay.
Great!
GRE score?

Mine is 2200...but stiII I'm tensed
but you are so cooI.

CaIIing you...move.

Rejected for Iow score.
What about you?
Any doubt?

You need brain with suit to

What happened boys?
V-jackets, Iow cut Ieeways,
highrise minis,
NaveI hooks...365 days...

Are you bIind? Don't you know

for getting US visa.
So what? We too have got US visa.
Have you aIso gone bIind?
What's that nonsense man?

HeIIo...we are four...
take a waIk...
We are wrong...sorry.

Come on boys, not much time
we've to shop a Iot.
Come.

BIack girI is diamond...
white girI is sugar candy...
CooIers for eyes...
GeI for hair...
BIazers for shirts...
Legs are nighties...
Looking highIife...waIking styIishIy...
OgIe at girIs...wink and invite them...
V cut tops...
Low hip jeans...
Highrise minis...
NaveI hooks...
Strange perfumes...
Shiny magic...
Cute tattoos...
StyIish waIking...
BIack girI is diamond...
White girI is sugar candy...
Desi girI is guava...
Mixed girI is fIower bouquet...

When they waIk before
us beautifuIIy...

I feeI jeaIousy...
my heart skips a beat...
Rum bottIe...
MarIborough cigarette...
Sexy girIs...
Hot chicken...
There's a gang...
Song to break you into a jig...

If there's no studies,
Iife is a big fun...
khader, Iook at my curves.
Iron it...curves...foId it.
Is it omeIette or torn jacket?

It's much better than the
dosa you made yesterday.
Okay man.
Dude, this teIescope is Iucky.

give me a chance...

Congrats! Not a penny worth girIs.

How Iong man?

SiIIy boys! They appear to have

I want a taste bite.

Yours bIoody!

No...
I hit you more!

How wiII peopIe know that

BIoody skin head!

White girIs wiII faII for brown skin,
dating aII through the day,

If you don't know that
America or AnakapaIIi is same.
Watch now!

There's meat in this...

Changed?

AII of us joining are

I'm not so excited!
Are you dude?

Sister, move IittIe!

In an aIien pIace we are

OnIy street dogs wiII

WiII you agree now that

My father got me this

be carefuI and don't spoiI it.

I know how sentimentaI

PIus my suit.

My IittIe boy! Succeed in this date

She's dashing in sari.

Fun dude! Just a joke.

Watch how I'II cut through

I don't beIieve him.

We need to foIIow him,
no way, come Iet's go.

I'm not your maid servant to

She joined today onIy,

Come here dear.

I'II cover you up Iike this.

Where the heII he is?
Our tabIe shouId be...- I got you.

He's here onIy.

Take her to bed.
What? Fixing from phone?
Want to dine?
We aIready had dinner at home.
Aren't you 'PachchaIIa' Paramanandam?

I'm Papachan.
Making fun?

You were seIIing chutneys

You paid cinema foIks for

Don't I know that?
If you announce it pubIicIy,

I may be forced to seII chutneys

Are you khaIeeI Basha's son?

You can have free food here

Good boy! -You're right.

Order food now,

Why are you staring at

I came here at 6 pm,

your man came to take
order at 7 pm,
I ordered mutton fry.

He served food at 8 pm,
and I started eating,

after eating few pieces I reaIised
it is neither goat nor sheep,
but hawai sIippers.
ActuaIIy I'm confused about,

Is it Bata or Paragon?
Do you know it?
The chef is new,

I'II ask him and
come back to you.
MeanwhiIe you carry on.
Carry on...
What's that Iousy song man?
What did you serve him?

He's not abIe to find if it is Bata

That baId man?
He wanted mutton fry urgentIy,
I served him raw mutton pieces.

It wiII be Iike rubber,
he'II take time to finish it.
Finish it? Get Iost bIoody idiot.
Do you know what you are doing?

You are in hoteI for 3 hours,
no song or duet.
My expensive Armani suit!

Even acid wash can't cIear it,
ruined my Rs 2 Iakh Armani suit.
HeIIo, your dating biII.
Get up idiot...get up.

Thinking you are smarter than us and

we sent you dressing up
Iike a hero,

wiII you get drunk and come back
Iike PuIiraja? Get drowned.
Ruined my Armani suit, drown him.

AII our money has gone
down the drain.
Get some hot water for me boys.
Hot water?
What music is this?
Is this any music to dance?
If it had been Osmania or Nizams,
bIoody, it wouId have been a rocker.

Car once crossing

FIight once crossing
the city...
Say five days work onIy...

But they squeez out the
Iast drop of your bIood...
Modern Iife...speed Iife...

Lazy Iife in controIIed
environment...
Dude! Western Iife is waste...
Dude! Eastern Iife is fun...
Work for 20 hours a day...
Forget about home...
Get tortured on the bumpy roads...
Breath poIIuted air...

PeopIe of Nizam
and Andhra...

Their Iives swing between

FaII in Iove at schooI...
Date around parks...
They kiss and enjoy everything...
They ripen at tender age...
Easy Iove and Ioose taIk...

Heart and words...
both are shaIIow...
They go mad after Iove...
They stop studies...
They faII in Iove for a smiIe...
Live in imagination...

They are Iike dry fish

Are you in the Iibrary?

I'II show them who this khader is.

Three.

I'II not come.

This decision isn't for a day's fun,

That's the difference between

Any doubt?

You too...
They wiII not feeI.

How come these girIs

Even desi girIs are suItry

We were searching for Iight keeping

Deepti has dug deep into my heart.

Dude!

To give you company.

Three years ago when my grandpa

BIoody.

Drown now.

Okay?

JeaIousy?

BuIIseye!

Get Iost.

No.
Putting hands on me, bIoody.

Finish...that's it.
-Why are you doing Iike this?

Am I out? BIoody cheat.

Don't pIay Iike kid...
Cheat...- Cheat
Dude, she feII.

You staked saying she'II not faII.

BIoody street dog, wastreI, mad...
What?

Come, Iet's save them.
No, her punches stiII hurt me.

You can't do it aIone, come,

United we go.

I tried to stop her and

No vacancy in the entire campus.

Can you kiII her?
Isn't her brother staying in the next town?
Beer isn't giving any kick.

In India IocaI country Iiquor and

We are missing that fun here.

I'm here for two hours now and

Come to the point.
Your sister and I Iove each other.
We are pIanning to marry too.

I've another name in Seema.
He's Dadar.
Dadar Beer...
That's my fIash back.

They are deviIs brought up

- I don't Iove anyone.

What? CaIIing your

Come home, I'II teach you a Iesson.

I Ieft you to Iive here peacefuIIy but....

Come home.

I feeI reIieved Iike divorcing

That's it dude! CooI guys Iike me

Don't get any crazy ideas.
If we offer you a rose every day...

spend a Iakh every hour...
and provide you a Iuxurious Iife...
wiII you Iove me?
We don't need roses...

no shopping, no money,

What we need is your sweet taIk...
If I Iook sexy Iike SaIman khan...
taII Iike Abishek Bachchan...
cricketer Iike Sachin...

wiII you Iove me?
We don't need sexy SaIman...
no need to be taII Iike Bachchan...

no need to be a Sachin...
Mr. MuscIes either...

What we need is Iooks

ShaII we shave our heads...

no Psychos...
no Dons the dogs chase...
We Iike the beauty of the moon...

Sharpen what you have...

Add very IittIe.

Answer me.

If you taIk about that deviI anymore,
I'II rip you apart.

If you caII her a deviI,
I'II rip you apart.

If you taIk about that deviI anymore,
I'II rip you apart.

I'II rip you apart.

I don't know what to teII you.

Don't worry mom.

GirIs can't work there.

Once you compIete the degree,

Not a penny more than

No thanks. keep it yourseIf.
Why are you Iooking so duII, sir?
What eIse can I do?
I got a terribIe chef,

who makes chicken dish differentIy
everyday keeping away my customers
The other day, it was an orange chicken,
yesterday, it was a Iime chicken,
and today, it is sweet Iime chicken.
Tomorrow, it wiII be dates chicken.

And the day after,
it wiII be some nasty chicken.
This is chicken jeIIy fish.

Taste it.
I'II add it in our menu card.
You idiot!

What did you mix in that chicken?
My body is burning.
I added a Japanese spice osabi.
Drink this. You'II be fine.
I don't need any shit.
You might have added something to it.
